entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening then east 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
